script:
They are broadcasting a program on TV. I will keep you updated on what happens, and at the end, I will ask you a question about what happened on the show. Okay?
(On TV) Nathan entered the patio.
(On TV) Jack entered the patio.
(On TV) The slacks are in the basket.
(On TV) Nathan moved the slacks to the drawer.
(On TV) Jack exited the patio.
(On TV) Nathan exited the patio.
(On TV) Jack entered the TV_room.
The TV program has ended for today. Where will Nathan look for the slacks?
Provide your answer in JSON form with a single word as answer, like this: {"answer": "word"}
Be as specific as possible.
